title: Event Horizon Metal Pack
description: Collection of 13 instrumental tracks: full compositions, looped versions and looped chunks for each song. All in the style of alternative metal/hard rock. Great for dynamic, action oriented projects - shooters, beat'em ups, etc.
longDescription:
The pack contains the full Event Horizon album, available to stream on SoundCloud and YouTube

Collection of 13 instrumental tracks from the Event Horizon album by Karol Kosacki: full compositions, looped versions and looped chunks for each song. All in the style of alternative metal/hard rock.

Great for dynamic, action oriented projects - shooters, beat'em ups, etc.

Important: Event Horizon album includes six songs from the previous release, The Spiral EP, now with new sound, arrangement, and mix. Both old and new versions of these songs are included in Infinity Tone Metal Pack 2, available for purchase here.
technicalDetails:
01. Wavelength [full - 0:59, one looped chunk]
02. Prism [full - 4:11, looped - 4:00, 11 looped chunks]
03. Seconds [full - 3:11, looped - 2:59, 11 looped chunks]
04. Sunrise [full - 3:21, looped - 3:00, 10 looped chunks]
05. Spiral [full - 3:30, looped - 3:26, 12 looped chunks]
06. Mirrors [full - 4:25, looped - 4:22, 12 looped chunks]
07. Edge [full - 3:07, looped - 2:32, 10 looped chunks]
08. Phoenix [full - 4:13, looped - 3:49, 12 looped chunks]
09. Gravity Well [full - 3:45, looped - 3:40, 13 looped chunks]
10. Regrow [full - 3:16, looped - 3:12, 10 looped chunks]
11. Submerge [full - 2:51, looped - 2:46, 11 looped chunks]
12. The Sequence [full - 1:28, looped - 1:25, 9 looped chunks]
13. Free Fall [full - 3:09, looped - 2:53, 8 looped chunks]

Technical Details:
Number of Audio tracks: 155
Number of Audio Cues: 155
Sample rate \ bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs
Does music \ audio loop: looped chunks and non-looping, full compositions
How many minutes of audio provided: 41:25

Intended Platform: All
